data.name: Sephonie Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The 34-track soundtrack to Sephonie.

Note: the installation directory contains a folder of about 60 bonus .mp3's (Outtakes, unused songs, drafts) that you might find interesting to listen to!
data.about_the_game:
The 34-track soundtrack to Sephonie.

Note: the installation directory contains a folder of about 60 bonus .mp3's (Outtakes, unused songs, drafts) that you might find interesting to listen to!
data.short_description: The 34-track soundtrack to Sephonie, as well as additional bonus songs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 900 MB available space

data.legal_notice:
Copyright Analgesic Productions LLC, a USA LLC. Sephonie is a pending trademark of Analgesic Productions.

Sephonie does not collect any personal identifying information from its users outside of what Steam collects (hardware info, playtime, achievement stats)..
